We used ArcGIS 10.2 (Esri, Redlands, CA, USA) to calculate the change in climate suitability ( C) between current conditions and those projected for the 2050s and 2080s (under the low, medium, and high concentration scenarios, respectively; Yu et al., 2014). We used the following equation to estimate C:
